amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the Department of Interior water and related resources account by $55 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 22 printed in the Congressional Record to reduced funds for the Water and Related Resources Account by $55 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hensarling amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 121 - 305 (Roll no. 507).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Hensarling.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Hensarling amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 121 - 305 (Roll no. 507).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
